title: De Klinker
description: A place for students, squatters, activists, and leftwing idealists located in former squat De Grote Broek (squatted since 1984, now rented) in the city center. Run by volunteers and is the political center of this student city. On Sat-Sun a 3-course vegan menu is served at 19:00 (and 1st & 3rd Fri of month); reservation is required by phone and special requests can then also be made. Wed is soup cafe 18:30-20:00 (followed by a movie on 1st & 3rd Wed of month) with soup, bread, spreads and pasta/couscous, salad; reservation not necessary, price is voluntary donation. Sat afternoon is lunch cafe with also vegan cake. Space fits 60 people. Disco/concert area in the basement, usually a party on Sat. Restaurant and disco are available for free including bar, on request, for non-profit events.
